titleStmt.title: Horrible newes from Colebrooke, declaring the cruelty of Prince Robert in plundering the said towne, and exercising tirany against the inhabitants also declaring how twelve cavaliers were taken at VVatford by his excellence the Earle of Essex : whereunto is annexed, exceeding joyfull newes from Greenwich in Kent, declaring how the Kings armory was seized on, for the service of the King and Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
